pages.text: All bosses in this mod will adjust their level $(l)according to the number of plants nearby$(). The more plants there are, $(bred)the higher the boss level will be$(), so please rely on strategy to win as much as possible, rather than piling up the number of plants.
There are often $(bred)plants that must be prepared$() in advance to defeat the bosses in this mod, so remember to read the $(l)corresponding boss chapters$().
